sen.j: 正親町 季秀（おおぎまち すえひで、天文 (元号)17年（1548年） - 慶長17年7月1日 (旧暦)（1612年7月28日））は、安土桃山時代から江戸時代初期の公家。

sen.e: After celebration of his attainment of manhood in 1559, he continued to be promoted ranging from Ukone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), Ukone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), and Kurodo no to (Head Chamberlain) to Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards) in Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) and Sangi in 1576, and was raised to the peerage as Kugyo (the top court officials).

sen.j: 天正10年（1582年）6月の本能寺の変に際しては、皇太子誠仁親王とともに二条御所（織田信長が造営して誠仁親王に献上していた）にいたのだが、まもなく織田信忠らが二条御所へ逃れてきて、ここは危険なのですぐにも内裏へ逃れるよう言われた。
sen.e: At the time of the Honnoji Incident on June 1582, he stayed at Nijo-gosho Palace (built by an order of Nobunaga ODA and given to Imperial Prince Sanehito) with prince, and soon told by Nobutada ODA who escaped from the Honno-ji Temple to go back to the Imperial Palace immediately to avoid a danger.
